text: Ne mubandu baliho ababoolanga mbu khusuubile Nyasaye, ne olwa basinyisibwa khunjila ya Nyasaye, bamalanga bakhola amabii ka Abandu okhuba shinga eshinyasio shia Nyasaye. Ne obuhabini okhurula khu Nyasaye wuwo nibuula ni baboola mbu; “Toto efwe khubeele halala ninanyu” Koo! Nyasaye shamanyile akali mumioyo chiabandu tawe
